message: The shaking has grown to a terrifying intensity.
We're running out of time and the bike is flooring it.
I hold tightly to Akushima with one hand, gripping the handlebar with the other in a desperate attempt not to fall off.
The bike takes the stairs at reckless speeds and shoots out of the first floor entrance.
When I look up at the tower, I see it swaying. Cracks stab through its pristine surface.
The bike suddenly brakes and swerves to the side, skidding with a scream of tires.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Woah! ...Ngh!"
I fly off, unable to hold on, and tumble along the ground for a few meters.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Ouch."
I get up and look at the bike. It's smoking.
I quickly run up and right the frame.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey, you okay?!"

name: トリ
message: "...Yeah. Just some minor damage."
...Phew. One less thing to worry about.

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "Hey!"
The guys from Mink's gang run up to us.

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "Looks like you made it!"

name: ミンクチームＢ
message: "We were freaking out down here! Dunno what we woulda done if you hadn't gotten out!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "That explosion... Was that you guys?"

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "Yeah, boss's orders."

name: ミンクチームＢ
message: "Anyway, let's get the hell outta here!"
I hear the sound of an engine revving and spin around to see the bike making a beeline for the tower.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey!"
That thing might collapse any second!
I run after, but someone grabs my shoulder.

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "That's his job. We need to get outta here."
Mink's guys are staring up at the tower.
...Of course. They want to save him too.

name: ミンクチームＢ
message: "We don't know everything, but we know enough."

name: ミンクチームＢ
message: "So... we're leaving. That's what he woulda wanted."
The other members of Scratch bow their heads.
...This isn't easy for them, either.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Alright. Let's go."
Just as they start to walk off, I notice someone on the ground.
...Akushima. He's still unconscious.

name: ミンクチームＢ
message: "What's wrong?"
After a moment's hesitation, I walk over to Akushima.
I slip an arm under his shoulder and stand him up.

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "Hey. What're you doing with him?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "He'll die if I leave him here. I just wanna get him far enough away from the tower..."

name: ミンクチームＢ
message: "How stupid are you?! Leave that asshole!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I can't just let him die."
Damn, he's heavy...
As I stumble along beneath Akushima's weight, one of the guys who was staring in disbelief runs over.
Cursing, he takes Akushima's other shoulder.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Thanks. I owe you."

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "Not gonna let you die saving this piece of shit!"

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "And just so we're clear, we ain't taking him with us. We get him a safe distance away and then we dump his ass."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I got it already."
It's a lot easier to move him with help.

name: ミンクチームＢ
message: "Hurry!"
A massive tremor shakes the ground, and a cloud of dust billows out to fill the area.
We run as fast as we can. No looking back.
